#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	string str;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>str;
		int mid=str.size()/2;
		string lefthalf="";
		string righthalf="";
		for(int i=mid-1;i>=0;i--)
		lefthalf+=str[i];
		int len=str.size();
		for(int i=len-1;i>=mid;i--)
		righthalf+=str[i];
		string str1="";
		str1+=lefthalf;
		str1+=righthalf;
		cout<<str1<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
